title: Premier League team news, injury updates and more – live!
text:
10:14

Manchester United midfielder Paul Pogba is in a “race” to be fit for Arsenal’s visit to Manchester United on Monday evening. The midfielder is a doubt because of an ankle injury sustained in the Carabao Cup win over Rochdale in midweek. Pogba picked up a knock to an ankle on Wednesday. His absence at a team-bonding meal led to further scrutiny on his Old Trafford future but United manger Ole Gunnar Solskjær said:

The situation is he finished the game, which is fantastic, but he got a knock to his ankle which is very swollen. It was better for him not to go there with the team and he’s in a race, I would guess, for Monday.”

Pogba would be an eighth frontline player unavailable to Solskjær.
description: News, previews and Friday press conference updates before the seventh week of action in the 2019-20 Premier League
